# flipt_environment (Data Source)

Flipt environment data source. Environments are read-only and configured server-side.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) Unique key for the environment

### Read-Only

- `default` (Boolean) Whether this is the default environment
- `name` (String) Display name of the environment
